::Aerotaur::
       "I think that the training would be a good idea.  You've never refused 
to fight to protect something, so I don't think it's your aggressiveness.  As 
soon as we can get to our new home I'll start training you."  He nods grimly.

--part1_23.1837fe2a.2984a7a9_boundary
